text:
I love diners, and I love breakfast out on the weekends.  I would love to like this place.  Food was decent.  Service was not.  And it is simply a VERY dirty place.  
If they spent a half-day cleaning it, and suggested to servers to greet people and smile occasionally it would improve drastically.
